content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Japanese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

School debate (Selection plays one time.)
content.question: What does Ms. Suzuki argue?

choices.label: Only healthy items should be sold in vending machines.
There should be no vending machines in schools.
Teachers should monitor what food the students bring to school.
Cafeterias need to start using more natural ingredients.

content.answer: Only healthy items should be sold in vending machines.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
